mapper.select: SELECT id, name, password, create_date FROM t_user WHERE name = #{name} AND password = #{password}
SELECT u.id as user_id, u.name as user_name, u.create_date, r.id as role_id, r.name as role_name FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur ON(u.id=ur.user_id) LEFT JOIN t_role r ON(r.id=ur.role_id)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user (id,name, password, create_date) VALUES (#{id},#{name}, #{password}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_user SET password=#{newPassword} WHERE id=#{id}
